bagel.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a small ring-shaped type of bread
bagel.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: an occasion when a tennis player wins all six games in a set, so that the score is 6-0
bagel.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Murray dominated the match and won with a triple bagel 6-0,6-0,6-0.
